Text: The Riverside Canal is an irrigation canal in El Paso County beginning southeast of El Paso, Texas.

Text: Riverside Canal (El Paso):  The canal acquires water from the Riverside Diversion Dam on the Rio Grande 15 mi southeast of El Paso.
